item.title: Asha Bhosle doesn't miss a beat even at 91 as she sings Tauba Tauba, recreates Vicky Kaushal's hook step at Dubai show - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Asha Bhosle doesn't miss a beat even at 91 as she sings Tauba Tauba, recreates Vicky Kaushal's hook step at Dubai show

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

At 91, legendary singer Asha Bhosle continues to impress audiences with her performances. Recently, she performed the hit song Tauba Tauba during a concert in Dubai, showcasing her ability to keep up with current trends.

  • Asha Bhosle performed Tauba Tauba, a song by Karan Aujla, in Dubai.
  • She danced to the signature moves associated with the song, popularized by Vicky Kaushal.
  • Videos of her performance went viral, receiving widespread praise on social media.
  • Karan Aujla expressed his gratitude for her performance and shared his admiration on Instagram.
“Respect... WHAT AT 91... MOST ELDERLY PEOPLE I KNOW IN THEIR EARLY 60’S CAN’T EVEN WALK ON THEIR OWN AND LOOK AT ASHA TAI DOING ALL OF THAT WITH SO MUCH OF FLAMBOYANCE AND FINESSE.”

Asha Bhosle's vibrant performance at this age is a testament to her enduring talent and passion for music.

item.title: Gal Gadot reveals she was diagnosed with blood clot in brain during 4th pregnancy, underwent surgery during delivery - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Gal Gadot reveals she was diagnosed with blood clot in brain during 4th pregnancy, underwent surgery during delivery

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Gal Gadot announced that she was diagnosed with a brain blood clot during her fourth pregnancy, leading to emergency surgery. She aims to raise awareness about this rare condition.

  • Gal Gadot gave birth to her daughter Ori earlier this year.
  • She suffered from excruciating headaches before being diagnosed with Cerebral venous thrombosis (CVT).
  • Approximately 3 in 100,000 pregnant women in their 30s+ are diagnosed with CVT.
  • Gadot underwent emergency surgery shortly before delivering Ori.
  • She emphasized the importance of listening to one’s body and raising awareness about CVT.
“It’s vital to listen to our bodies and trust what it’s telling us. Awareness matters.” - Gal Gadot

This experience has led Gadot to reflect on the fragility of life and the importance of health awareness.

item.title: 2024: 3 Films Won Hearts with a Genuine Attempt - M9
item.description:
2024: 3 Films Won Hearts with a Genuine Attempt

Publication Date: 2024
Source: M9 News

M9 News is doing a year-end recap for 2024, and we found only three movies that gained recognition through their genuine efforts.

  • The three films are 35 Chinna Katha Kaadu, Committee Kurrollu, and Pekamedalu.
  • These films did not feature any star-driven hype or promotional gimmicks.
  • Positive word-of-mouth contributed to their success on OTT platforms.
  • Nivetha Thomas’ performance in 35 Chinna Katha Kaadu was particularly praised.
  • Committee Kurrollu captured 90s nostalgia effectively.
  • Pekamedalu resonated with audiences for its relatable story.
“We wish them the best with their future projects, if they continue to make genuine films.”

These films were recognized for their honest efforts, showcasing the power of genuine storytelling in cinema.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut Lauds Himachal Women, Calls Them ‘Equal Or Better Looking’ Than Preity Zinta, Yami Gautam - News18
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut Praises Himachal Women’s Beauty and Hard Work

Date: December 30, 2024 | Source: News18

Actress and politician Kangana Ranaut recently lauded women from her home state of Himachal Pradesh, praising their hard work and beauty on social media. She mentioned fellow actresses including Preity Zinta and Yami Gautam in her message, highlighting the strength and dedication of Himachali women.

  • Kangana appreciates the hardworking women of Himachal Pradesh.
  • She acknowledges fellow actresses like Preity Zinta and Yami Gautam.
  • Shared sentiments about women working in fields without social media recognition.
  • Celebrated Christmas with traditional food and shared personal moments on social media.
  • Discussed her upcoming movie, 'Emergency', and its new release date.
"When I go to Himachal and see our women equally or better looking than us work tirelessly in the fields... I feel they can definitely do with some hype."

This heartfelt acknowledgment of women’s contributions serves as a reminder of their unsung efforts and beauty.

item.title: 'Baby John' box office collection day 5: Varun Dhawan’s massy action drama struggles to cross ₹30 crore, - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John box office collection day 5: Varun Dhawan’s massy action drama struggles to cross ₹30 crore, while Allu Arjun's ‘Pushpa 2’ continues to impress

Date: October 25, 2023

Source: Times of India

Introduction

The latest update on the box office performance reveals that Varun Dhawan’s film 'Baby John' is having difficulty crossing ₹30 crore in its first five days, while 'Pushpa 2' continues to perform well.

Key Points

  • 'Baby John' has grossed approximately ₹30 crore in its initial five days.
  • Varun Dhawan’s film faces tough competition from 'Pushpa 2'.
  • Allu Arjun’s 'Pushpa 2' continues to gain traction and impress audiences.
  • Industry experts are analyzing the reasons behind the underperformance of 'Baby John'.

Notable Quotes or Statistics

“The film's performance is underwhelming given the hype prior to its release.”

Conclusion

While 'Baby John' struggled at the box office, the ongoing success of 'Pushpa 2' illustrates the competitive nature of the film industry.

item.title: Kalki 2898 AD, Stree 2, Moana, to Inside Out 2: Highest grossing Bollywood and Hollywood films of 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Top Grossing Films of 2024: Bollywood and Hollywood Highlights

Date: December 29, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The year 2024 proved to be an extraordinary year for both Bollywood and Hollywood, showcasing a series of blockbusters that captivated audiences with compelling storytelling and star-studded casts.

  • Kalki 2898 AD: A sci-fi epic grossing approximately ₹1100 crore worldwide, starring Prabhas, Amitabh Bachchan, and Deepika Padukone.
  • Stree 2: Directed by Amar Kaushik, this sequel grossed around ₹850 crore at the box office.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule: Surpassing ₹1700 crore, it's the highest-grossing Bollywood film of the year.
  • Inside Out 2: A major success for Hollywood, it earned nearly USD 1.7 billion worldwide.
  • Deadpool & Wolverine: Another Marvel hit, grossing over USD 1.138 billion.
“The number you see is a reflection of the people's love.” - Allu Arjun

As the year draws to a close, both industries are poised for exciting future releases including highly anticipated films from top actors.

item.description:

  • Professional environment may be challenging, but opportunities for new roles are present.
  • Beware of minor health issues affecting daily life.

Overall, the day encourages Pisces to maintain positivity in personal and professional aspects, while being cautious with health and finances.

item.description:

"Your attitude will play a crucial role in client sessions and team meetings."

item.title: Mrunal Thakur Exudes Elegance In Traditional Purple Silk Saree; See Pics - News18
item.description:
Mrunal Thakur Exudes Elegance In Traditional Purple Silk Saree; See Pics

Publication Date: December 29, 2024, 20:34 IST
Source: News18

Mrunal Thakur captivates her audience once again with her recent photoshoot, showcasing a rich purple Banarasi silk saree that highlights her elegance.

  • Mrunal opted for a six-yard saree that features intricate golden traditional patterns.
  • The saree was paired with a matching purple sleeveless blouse with a scooped neckline.
  • Her makeup included dewy elements with blushed cheeks and a pinkish lip shade.
  • She styled her hair in a sleek bun and adorned herself with jhumka earrings and traditional bangles.
“Take cues from Mrunal if you’re looking for something for upcoming family functions and puja ceremonies.”

Mrunal demonstrates that she can effortlessly pull off both traditional and contemporary looks, making her a fashion icon for various occasions.

item.title: Hindi Flopped: Will Theri Remake Click in Telugu?.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Hindi Flopped: Will Theri Remake Click in Telugu?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Great Andhra

Theri was one of the biggest hits in Tamil superstar Vijay's and director Atlee’s careers, but recent attempts to remake it in Telugu have faced challenges.

  • The original film was dubbed as Police in Telugu but was quickly taken out of theaters for a remake.
  • Remakes with actors Ravi Teja and Pawan Kalyan didn't materialize successfully.
  • Harish Shankar created a version named Ustaad Bhagat Singh, but filming stopped after 10 days due to elections.
  • The Hindi remake produced by Atlee also flopped at the box office, raising doubts about the Theri remake's relevance.
“The story of Theri has lost its freshness over time.”

The future of the Telugu remake remains uncertain as Harish Shankar is focused on other projects.

item.title: Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 30, 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Horoscope Today: Astrological prediction for December 30, 2024

Date: December 30, 2024 - Source: Hindustan Times

Daily astrology predictions highlight the potential opportunities and challenges for each zodiac sign. This guide offers insights for Aries through Pisces to navigate your day effectively.

  • Aries: Avoid major investments; expect stability in family matters.
  • Taurus: Financial rewards are likely; focus on maintaining harmony.
  • Gemini: A promising day for property investments; stay engaged socially.
  • Cancer: Avoid new financial ventures; focus on health.
  • Leo: Positive career news may emerge; expect increased earnings.
  • Virgo: Caution advised for new acquaintances; success anticipated academically.
  • Libra: Likely success in studies; family visits could brighten the day.
  • Scorpio: Financial prospects look good; focus on health and exercise.
  • Sagittarius: Good money management will enhance savings; expect busy schedules in education.
  • Capricorn: Stay active for fitness; a favorable day for travel.
  • Aquarius: Focus will lead to prosperity; keep social engagements in mind.
  • Pisces: Real estate opportunities may arise; professionalism will attract clients.
"You may feel closer to loved ones than before." - Horoscope prediction for Pisces

This day's predictions offer valuable guidance for each zodiac sign, allowing individuals to prepare for what lies ahead.

item.title: Marco Day 10 Worldwide Box Office: Unni Mukundan's violent-actioner has excellent 2nd weekend; Rs 100 crore dream shall be achieved - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Marco Day 10 Worldwide Box Office: Unni Mukundan's Violent-Actioner Nears Rs 100 Crore

Updated on: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Unni Mukundan's Marco is maintaining strong momentum in its second weekend at the box office, with expectations to surpass the Rs 100 crore mark globally.

  • The movie grossed Rs 15 crore during its second weekend.
  • Current total gross stands at Rs 68 crore, with Rs 41 crore from India and Rs 27 crore from overseas.
  • Marco is expected to cross the Rs 70 crore mark soon.
  • The film has gained popularity, similar to the Kannada film Kantara, and is expanding its reach with Telugu and Tamil dubbed versions set to release soon.
“Marco continues to score well in its 2nd weekend, becoming a massive hit across various languages.”

This success marks a significant achievement for Unni Mukundan and the film, as it positions itself among the top earners of the year.

item.title: PM Narendra Modi hails legendary ANR in Maan ki Baat’s latest episode - 123telugu
item.description:
PM Narendra Modi hails legendary ANR in Maan ki Baat’s latest episode

Published on Dec 29, 2024 11:56 pm IST

The Akkineni family and the Telugu film industry celebrated the centenary birth anniversary of legendary actor Akkineni Nageswara Rao (ANR). Prime Minister Narendra Modi acknowledged ANR's contributions to Indian cinema in the latest episode of his audio series, Mann ki Baat.

  • India honored ANR with a special stamp for his 100th birth anniversary.
  • A retrospective of ANR's classic films was featured at the International Film Festival of India in Goa.
  • PM Modi praised ANR for taking Telugu cinema to new heights and preserving Indian culture through his films.
  • Modi also paid tribute to other cinema legends like Raj Kapoor and Mohammad Rafi during this episode.
“Akkineni Nageswara Rao garu, with his contribution, took Telugu Cinema to new heights. In his films, Indian culture, heritage, and value system have been promoted and highlighted with great enthusiasm and honesty,” said PM Modi.

ANR's career was marked by prestigious awards including the Padma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan, Padma Shri, and Dada Saheb Phalke Awards, recognizing his invaluable contributions to cinema.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan evicted from Salman Khan show, fans say 'ab jaake dil ko sukoon mila' - DNA India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan Evicted from Salman Khan Show, Fans Say 'Ab Jaake Dil Ko Sukoon Mila'

Date: December 29, 2024 Source: DNA India

Sara Arfeen Khan was evicted in the latest episode of Bigg Boss 18, marking a significant elimination in the competition as the show reaches its top 10 contestants.

  • Sara's eviction occurred during the Weekend Ka Vaar episode on December 29, 2024.
  • The top contestants left include Karan Veer Mehra, Rajat Dalal, and Avinash Mishra among others.
  • This week, Sara was among seven nominees but was ultimately eliminated.
  • Fans expressed mixed reactions, with some celebrating the eviction.
One fan commented, "Ab jaake dil ko sukoon mila hai" and others expressed their views on the fairness of this eviction.

The show is heading towards its Grand Finale set for the third weekend of January 2025, with more evictions anticipated in the coming weeks.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan gets eliminated, show gets Top 10 contestants - The Times of India
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Sara Arfeen Khan gets eliminated, show gets Top 10 contestants

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

Sara Arfeen Khan has been eliminated from Bigg Boss 18, leaving the show with its top 10 contestants. This marks a significant moment in the competitive reality series.

  • Sara Arfeen Khan was a prominent contestant in Bigg Boss 18.
  • The show has now reached its top 10 contestants after her elimination.
  • The season has seen intense competition among participants.
  • This elimination is expected to shift the dynamics of the remaining contestants.
“Every elimination changes the game; we look forward to seeing who steps up next.”

This elimination is a pivotal moment as the competition heats up among the remaining contestants.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 5 Early Trends: Opening Weekend Of Varun Dhawan Starrer Is Shockingly Lower Than Pushpa 2’s 4th Weekend! - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 5 Early Trends: Opening Weekend Of Varun Dhawan Starrer Is Shockingly Lower Than Push

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

The verdict of Varun Dhawan’s Baby John is out, revealing poor box office performance despite an opening on Christmas holiday. The film has struggled to attract audiences and failed to perform even on its opening weekend following a dismal trend.

  • Opening day collection: 11.25 crores
  • Day 2 collection: 5.13 crores
  • Day 3 collection dropped to: 3.65 crores
  • Day 4 collection slightly increased to: 4.25 crores
  • Day 5 estimated collection: 4.50-4.80 crores
“In the post-pandemic era, being a remake is a curse, and the audience is hardly giving such films any chance.”

In total, Baby John has grossed only 28.78-29.08 crores at the Indian box office, significantly lower than expected, even compared to other films like Pushpa 2.

item.title: Did you know Rajesh Khanna excluded wife Dimple Kapadia from will, left fortune to daughters Twinkle and - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Rajesh Khanna's Will Excludes Wife Dimple Kapadia, Leaves Fortune to Daughters

Publication Date: [Date Not Found] Source: [Source Not Found]

Rajesh Khanna's will has brought to light significant details regarding his estate, which has been left to his daughters Twinkle and Rinke, while his wife Dimple Kapadia has been excluded. There are also claims for compensation from his live-in partner, Anita Advani.

  • Rajesh Khanna excluded Dimple Kapadia from his will.
  • The late actor's fortune is bequeathed to his daughters, Twinkle and Rinke.
  • Anita Advani claims compensation from Khanna's estate.

item.title: NTR spotted in London with family, pics go viral - 123telugu
item.description:
NTR spotted in London with family, pics go viral

Published on: Dec 29, 2024 11:01 pm IST

NTR was recently spotted in London with his family, enjoying some quality time before the New Year. The actor was seen buying ice cream for his son during their outing.

  • NTR is taking time off after a busy shooting schedule for his upcoming films.
  • The actor is in London to celebrate the New Year with his family.
NTR was seen buying ice cream for his son while strolling in London.

This family outing has generated excitement among fans, particularly with the viral pictures circulating on social media.

item.title: Baby John Day 5 India Box Office: Varun Dhawan's action-drama nets only Rs 4.5 crore on Sunday; at the mercy of New Year holiday - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Baby John Day 5 India Box Office: Varun Dhawan's action-drama nets only Rs 4.5 crore on Sunday; at the mercy of New Year holiday

Date: December 29, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Varun Dhawan's 'Baby John' is heading for a disappointing end at the box office, struggling to attract audiences despite its star cast.

  • The film collected Rs 4.5 crore on its fifth day, totaling Rs 27 crore in its extended weekend.
  • Despite a strong opening of Rs 10.75 crore, the film saw a steep drop in subsequent days.
  • Mixed audience reactions and its remake status have hindered its box office performance.
  • The film is expected to conclude its global run under Rs 75 crore, leading to significant losses for the producers.
“The audience is not in any mood to show mercy to the remake movies these days.”

In conclusion, 'Baby John' reflects the challenges faced by filmmakers with remakes in a saturated market, and its underwhelming performance indicates a need for fresh content.
